articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'They will get out…': Karthik issues startling statement after AUS thrash IND - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Reflecting on India's batting performance against the Mitchell Starc-starrer side, Dinesh Karthik defended Indian batters after the host registered their third-lowest ODI total against Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Veteran Indian batter Dinesh Karthik hailed Australia's Mitchell Starc as the best white-ball bowler in the world after the speedster sparked a shocking batting collapse of Rohit Sharma and Co. in th… [+2535 chars]
